CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 5, 1960, pg. A7, reads: "'Man of the Year' Award - Dan McGibbeny, left of the Pittsburgh newspaper, Guild, presents Mr. and Mrs. Kenneth (Sky) Twyman, parents of Jack Twyman, Cincinnati Royals basketball star, the guild's 'Man of the Year' award. The presentation was made at the guild's Page One Ball on Saturday.  The honoree has been a loyal and unselfish aide to his stricken teammate, Maurice Stokes. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Dan McGibbeny, Mrs. Twyman, and Kenneth Twyman holding "Man of the Year" award clock
